Adrienne Ako Anomgbo Koutouan (a mụrụ n'afọ 1969) bụ onye na-eme ihe ọchị na onye na-ese ihe nkiri na Ivorian.
Koutouan bụ onye otu ndị Tchaman ma amụrụ ya n'obodo Abobo-Té na obodo Abobo dị nso na Abidjan Ọ chọrọ ịghọ onye na-eme ihe nkiri site na nwata, ọ bụ ezie na ndị mụrụ ya anabataghị echiche a
Ọ malitere ọrụ ya n'afọ ndị 1980 na "Fétiche éburnéen" otu ihe nkiri. N'afọ 1986, a kpọrọ Koutouan onye na-agba egwú kacha mma na ballet Ivory Coast.

Koutouan enwetala ọtụtụ onyinye, gụnyere arụmọrụ nwanyị kachasị mma na Namur Festival na Belgium n'afọ 1998, arụmọrụ nwanyị kachasị kyau na M-Net Festival na Johannesburg n'afọ 1999, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma n'Africa na mmemme Pabbah na Nigeria n'afọ 2002. N'afọ 2006, Koutouan nwetara onyinye Gold Standard na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou maka arụmọrụ ya na usoro Quand les éléphants se battent
A maara ya nke ọma na Ivory Coast maka ọrụ ya dịka Rosalie na usoro Faut pas fâcher N'afọ 2008, Koutouan pụtara dịka Infirmière Antoinette na Dr
N'April 14, 2019, a kwanyeere Koutouan ùgwù n'ememe maka afọ 30 ya dịka onye na-eme ihe nkiri, na-enweta ọtụtụ ọdịiche site na gọọmentị
O nwetara ọkwa onye ọrụ na Order of Cultural Merit, site na Ministry of Culture and Francophonie
Onye Katọlik na-anụ ọkụ n'obi, Koutouan nwekwara Mas iji sọpụrụ ya.
